entry.title: Using a storage engine without UTXO-index
entry.summary: In a message sent to the bitcoin-dev mailing list, Tomas introduced Bitcrust, which uses a transaction index that allows outputs to be looked up regardless of whether they have been spent or not. This kind of network enables light node applications that can ask peers to prove the existence and spentness of transaction outputs (TXOs).
